title: afk timers for open mid with 3 legit inters?
body:
i have no idea why im writing this, i guess as a last ditch effort to stick a dick up all riot emplyees asses. 3 inters in one game. what do you do about that? legit 3 inters...
why do i get 5 20min timers for open mid in that situation. 

but never mind, 4 of my 5 accounts are permad and now i cant play on this acc either. 
its funny how league has followed society's bit ch ass ways. 

Riot emplyees, u have turned this game shit, and have been doing so since season 4. 
Pussy ass fkn g@yboys. would like to see all u come to my neighbourhood and ill show u what a "toxic player" is like.

fuck you

replies.body: Um he is very toxic probs thatâ€™s where he is wrong
how many dicks u eat today home girl
Because Riot glorify being trash, but hate people that seem to wanna do stuff.

They are free to int. Inters just help riot identify people who swear so they can whack a 14 day suspension on. Inters seem to be valued by riot so you can either shut up and play or speak up and get banned.
always thought permas and suspensions are a way to get people to make new accounts and spend money on it to get the champs and level 30 of their old account. classic.

Because as long as they are playing the game, inting or not, they didn't do anything wrong.

If your doing something that isn't considered ok, context be damned you will receive your penalty.

this game is like cancer. shittest thing in the world yet you can never get rid of it...

at least now i have no choice, so i guess its a good thing lol
